xmlns="http://www.sitemaps.org/schemas/sitemap/0.9" xmlns="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-image/1.1" xmlns:video="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-video/1.1">
https://tmrev.io/movie/717636-Bad Company: The Official Authorised 40th Anniversary Documentary 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/gCjl2DkwKY4M6erK1nDNm4YhrjB.jpg Supported by Bad Company's major hit tracks, this candid film celebrates rock's hottest anthems in the company of the group's remaining three members: Paul Rodgers, Simon Kirke and Mick Ralphs, alongside contemporaries Brian May, Zoot Money, Sam Moore, Joe Elliott, Jason Bonham and many more. Bad Company: The Official Authorised 40th Anniversary Documentary
